This is a decorator that is used to add smart wallet actions to a client.

## Import

```ts
import { smartWalletActions } from "@alchemy/wallet-apis";
```

## Parameters

### signerClient

`SignerClient`
The signer client for signing operations

## Returns

`Function`
A function that takes an InnerWalletApiClient and returns smart wallet actions
